TABLE.NAME: qbank_yetkinlik_qmap
TABLE.COMMENT: Table for mapping questions to specific competencies

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the course where the mapping belongs

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the question to be mapped

FIELD.NAME: competencyid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the associated competency

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp when this mapping was created

INDEX.NAME: course_question_idx
INDEX.COMMENT: Index to speed up competency lookups for questions within a specific course
